name: Rainforest adventure - trekking in Medellín.
description:
Visiting Medellín
and tired of the hustle and bustle of the city? We are offering you an
alternative: breathe fresh air, and connect with nature without leaving the
metropolitan area. We will trek in a beautiful nature reserve, enjoy the
abundance of the rainforest, and swim (if you´re brave enough) in a crystal
clear water of the mountain creek pond, looking up a 50m high waterfall. There
will be a fair amount of walking, climbing and enjoying the peace and silence
of nature.
